titleInfo.title: List of sick, lame, and fatigued at Bogue Chitto

mods.abstract: On this two-sided "List of Men left in my charge Sick. Lame & wound out with fatigue," Dr. William Lawrence reports sixty-four unfit men. List includes not only their names, but it identifies their militia companies. Several deaths are noted at bottom of page 2.
